      We Power Your Mission to Uncover Data-driven Opportunities

      See How We Do It

      We Help You Turn Data Into Insights and Insights Into Results

      Efficiency has been a hallmark for Johnson Controls since we introduced the first electric thermostat more than 130 years ago. But today, the need for efficiency has become a matter of tremendous importance to everyone; we are here to help. Were focused on creating smart, data-driven products, solutions, and services. We design systems that optimize control of your facilitys environment using sensors and artificial intelligence to reduce energy consumption and overall operating costs.

      Working with our customers and partners around the world, we are creating a smart future for all kinds of facilities. We make buildings better for occupants, better for the environment, and better for your bottom line.

      Johnson Controls: The power behind your mission.

      Real Facilities; Real Solutions

      Read about how our customers are using Johnson Controls solutions to change the way their buildings and facilities work.

      Innovative technologies
      With a clear focus on Data Center Solutions, we are influencing the way owners and consultants think about building sustainable and secure, smart solutions in their data centers.
      Read the Press Release
      Office of the Future
      Middle Easts sustainability pioneer, Beeah, selects Johnson Controls and Microsoft to provide a sweeping array of artificial intelligence (AI) and smart building solutions for its new headquarters.
      Read the News Release

      The Next Generation of Smart and Connected

      A global portfolio of proven solutions.

      HVAC Equipment

      The largest portfolio of HVAC equipment and controls in the world.

      Security

      From access controls to intruder prevention, from video surveillance to cybersecurity.

      Building Automation & Controls

      The intelligence you need to create safer, smarter building environments.

      Fire Detection

      From componentssensors, initiating devices, annunciators, and control panelsto integrated systems.

      Insights

      Weve been innovating since 1885. Here is a selection of our thinking and perspectives.

      Hall of Fame Enshrinement Week Powered by Johnson Controls
      The spectacular Tom Benson Hall of Fame Stadium recently served as a world-class setting for Enshrinement Week Powered by Johnson Controls. The smart, safe, sustainable and connected stadium is a one-of-a-kind sports and entertainment complex, profiled by Forbes as one of the 13 Game-Changing NFL Stadiums. The stadium is outfitted with the latest technology and advanced solutions from Johnson Controls and its partners, and is the first visible sign of why the Johnson Controls Hall of Fame Village is The Most Inspiring Place on Earth." Learn More
